00036 #ifndef GENERALPLANESTIMULUSCELLFACTORY_HPP_
00037 #define GENERALPLANESTIMULUSCELLFACTORY_HPP_
00038 
00039 #include "PlaneStimulusCellFactory.hpp"
00040 
00048 template <class CELL, unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM = ELEMENT_DIM>
00049 class GeneralPlaneStimulusCellFactory : public PlaneStimulusCellFactory<CELL,ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>
00050 {
00051 
00052 public:
00068     GeneralPlaneStimulusCellFactory(unsigned numEleAcross, double meshWidth, bool useMeshWidthAsMag=false, double stimulusMagnitude=-1e7, double stimulusDuration=0.5)
00069         : PlaneStimulusCellFactory<CELL,ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>(stimulusMagnitude,stimulusDuration) // These values are overridden below anyway.
00070     {
00071         if (useMeshWidthAsMag)
00072         {
00073             #define COVERAGE_IGNORE
00074             this->mpStimulus.reset(new SimpleStimulus(meshWidth, 0.5));
00075             #undef COVERAGE_IGNORE
00076         }
00077         else
00078         {
00079             stimulusMagnitude*=numEleAcross/(64.0);
00080             // ELEMENT_DIM==1 Justification: elements go half size with each refinement
00081             // ELEMENT_DIM==2 Justification: Triangles go quarter size with each refinement, but there are twice as many nodes on boundary
00082             // ELEMENT_DIM==3 Hypothesis: Triangles go eighth size with each refinement, but there are four-times as many nodes on boundary
00083             stimulusMagnitude*=meshWidth/(0.2);
00084 
00085             //std::cout<<"Mag is "<<stimulusMagnitude<<"\n";
00086             this->mpStimulus.reset(new SimpleStimulus(stimulusMagnitude, stimulusDuration));
00087             LOG(1, "Defined a GeneralPlaneStimulusCellFactory<"<<SPACE_DIM<<"> with SimpleStimulus("<<stimulusMagnitude<<","<< stimulusDuration<< ")\n");
00088         }
00089     }
00090 
00091 };
00092 
00093 #endif /*GENERALPLANESTIMULUSCELLFACTORY_HPP_*/
